extendedInfo.description: Best App of the Year - AppAwards 2013â Special launching price! ENJOY edjing Premium Edition (PE) SPECIAL OFFER & SAVE $7 (USD)The PE version natively includes:- the Pre Cueing option so you can prepare your transitions in advance- TK Filter (Convergent + Divergent) to play with the resonance frequencies of your musicâ edjing is the best Pro DJ app on Android â Itâs the 1st social DJ App to Play, Mix and Share your sounds!âedjing is more than just a successful app, it stands out by its wide range of effects offer and its smooth usage.âAndroidmag.deA perfect way to share your passion for music and let others discover your mixing talent!â SOUNDCLOUD & DEEZER COMPATIBILITYIn addition to your Android native Music file, access the whole Deezer catalogue and mix more than 15 million tracks! (for Deezer Premium Plus Accounts)Furthermore, access to SoundCloud catalogue and enjoy an almost unlimitted stream of music.â JUST LIKE A REAL DJ WOULD: Realize professional-like transitions thanks to the crossfader. Match the beats manually or click on the Sync button to synchronize the bpm (beats per minute) of your tracks.â PLAY. MIX. SHARE & PARTY! ;)Being a DJ has never been so affordable! Party all night with edjing! Wow your friends during parties by mixing your songs like a Pro DJ or let edjing mix your playlists while youâre dancing your heart out!Thanks to the Auto mix, edjing does all the transitions for you. You can customize the transitions you want and program the auto synchronization of bpm (auto sync bpm option) so that the beats of your music always match.Have fun & Remix the trendiest tracks of the moment on your new pocket turntables!â FEEL THE BEATS & REINVENT YOUR MUSIC:Add Pro DJ effects and keep reinventing the music you love! Scratch or add special sound effects to enrich your mix and create new sounds: your sound!Enjoy a wide range of pro sound effects: scratch, flanger, echo, loop, pitch, equalizer, cue point. You can add multiple DJ effects at the same time: scratch on a loop or add a Flanger on a loop for instance.You can also get more advanced Pro DJ effects via our in-app Store!â RECORD & SHARE YOUR CREATIONS WITH YOUR FRIENDS:Record your mixes and share them with your friends on Facebook and Twitter thanks to the "eMix" feature. Record up to a whole hour of mixing. After recording your mix, donât forget to share them with your friends.â Let yourself immerse in a world of music: yours!YOU ARE THE DJ, NOW IT'S OVER TO YOU!More than 4 millions Downloads already! Join our DJ community and take control of your parties!Play. Mix. Share.N.B: edjing has developed its own Sound System to offer you the best audio experience possible: real time sound processing enabling you to mix your music live with increasingly realistic DJ effects.edjing also gives you the possibility to listen to your mixes and those of your friends on its internet website: www.edjing.comMake your move! Play. Mix. ShareGeneral Characteristics: â OS: Android 4.0 and upperâ Screen Compatibility  3.7" & upperâ RAM size > 1GB (recommended)â eMix function to share your mix on Facebook and Twitter (depending on Android phone)â Direct Access to your Android native Music file to mix your own musicâ SoundCloud & Deezer Compatibilityâ edjing PE Exclusivity: Pre Cueing & TK Filter natively includedâ 2 Turntables + Cross Fader â Scratch / Pitch on Vinyl â Wide Sound Spectrum for optimum Beats localization â Pro DJ effects (FX): Cue, Flanger, Loop, Echo, equalizerâ A store with additional effects (FX): Reverse, Double flipping, Auto Scratch, Reverbs, TK Oscilllator, Gateâ The possibility to earn vinyls to buy effectsâ Recording in High Definition CD quality, wave format â "AutoMix" mode for automatic transitionsâ BPM synchronization (sync)â Ability to remix mp3 files of more than 1 hourContact: support@edjing.comTAGS : dj, mix, premium, turntables, scratch, beats, mixer, traktor, djay, virtual dj, deejay

reviews.title: don\'t buy this app!!
reviews.comment: its a rip off!! I don\'t get to have all the fxs now I paid for this app and I got the same fxs that\'s on free version

reviews.title: Crashing on HTC One X+
reviews.comment: I e-mailed support about this: I am having problems with the app crashing on my HTC One X+ (Tegra 3). Also having problems getting the second turntable to play a selected track and the crossfade doesn\'t seem to be working. Love the app, however - really nice user interface and fun to play with.  Still having problems with the app crashing on the HTC One X+ after the latest update - similar problems as above...8/16 - still crashing. Hopefully, this will be fixed, shortly.
reviews.author: Andy Lewis

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: This App works. Period. For the first time I can mix on my Galaxy Note 10.2 AND record good quality mixes. Please add Folders option or replace Album option.
reviews.author: Zwelakhe Mabece

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great to find a mobile dj app that works so well for when I the mood hits me and my computer is nowhere in site.
reviews.author: Jeremy Williams

reviews.title: Pro you get 2 things extra
reviews.comment: U get pre cueing and one effect for yourbpurchase.  Come on with a skin and all the effects.  To get my moneys worth cuz as of right now it takes up more space for what .  Quick ideas;  mic somehow.
reviews.author: Soopa Dav

reviews.title: Good but could be perfect
reviews.comment: Some nice dj style effects here but can crash a little too, when changing songs on decks, get it sorted and get 5 stars
reviews.author: Alan Morling

reviews.title: Keeps crashing an screen goes mad
reviews.comment: Paid for this not happy want a refund if not fixed
reviews.author: Aaron Markides

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.comment: I downloaded the free app some time ago and have enjoyed immensely!I paid for the PE edition and could not get the apps to talk. I reached out for help and the developers responded overnight with a quick fix.  Great Job!

reviews.title: Mixed feelings...
reviews.comment: Pros: Nice n fluid UI, easy controls Cons: Multiple crashes, poor dev support, you cant select a 2nd song from the same folder on the same deck. I think apps should first get the basics working and then try to brush up all the extras. Too bad android doesn\'t have a stable dj app..
reviews.author: Vassilis Magoulas

reviews.title: OFF THE CHARTS!!!
reviews.comment: If u love music. . . then this is the app 4 u. . . it does it all. . . & then some. . . check it out & see 4 urself. . . 5***** + haff2laff
reviews.author: Terri Frederick

reviews.title: Crazy ill
reviews.comment: Honestly oncebyou open all the effects /  Awesome!!!!  I do have real dj equiment, but this right there with sound boards & studio aswell  turntables are smooth spin backwards action you can remix songs and record!!!!!!!    Record  60mins of spining havent tried longer just because i havent. You get all effects free in the app by earning them
reviews.author: Radeokilla Aguayo

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: I Love Edjing...so much..!
reviews.author: Edwin Buday

reviews.title: OHH MY!!!
reviews.comment: THIS IS IT FINALLY!!! A real edjing app for android. And on my S4 it works like a dream. I\'m already making a promo mix for my SOUNDCLOUD page.  As a producer the possibilities with this app for  instant remixes is endless. All you all  complaining about more free extras Please dont complain, in less than 30 min on this app, im already making money with it. Dont limit yourself by what you wish you all had. Use what\'s  there, make money with the app.  Then buy more vinyl with your EARNINGS. Enough already!
reviews.author: Arthur RAMBO

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab 3
reviews.comment: When are you guys gonna make a version th at support the galaxy tab 3 i downloaded it and it just load up and then exit back out please fix it

reviews.comment: I cant see the pitch number and the both tk number went i set to neon skin.. pls help fix it ty....

reviews.comment: Hottest app so far , just dont like that all of the features arent on here , but , its all good
